mil.emp3.api

Class Overlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Container
      • mil.emp3.api.Overlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainer, IOverlay, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoBase, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoContainer

    public class Overlay
extends mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Container
implements IOverlay
    This class handles all operations on a Geo Container object or Overlay.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Container

        geoContainer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Overlay()
      This default constructor creates an Overlay and its encapsulated GeoContainer.
      Overlay(org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoContainer geoContainer)
      This constructor create the overlay object with the provided object encapsulated within.

      • apply

        public void apply()
        Description copied from interface: IOverlay
        This method triggers an update of the overlay. After changing any properties, this method MUST be called to force an update.
        Specified by:
        apply in interface IOverlay
